00024 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00025     unsigned char programBuffer[512];
00026     int len;
00027     if(argc != 2) printUsage();
00028 
00029     /* Initialization========================================= */
00030     setupLogs(1, LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, DEFAULT_OUTPUT_FILENAME);

00033     setupCPU();

00037     write(DATA_SPACE_START, programBuffer, len);
